item.title: Like HSM teached us, 'This is me'
item.description: Introduction It is pretty hard to start a text to talk about yourself, even more difficult is to write an introduction about atext that talk about yourself, but let’s do it! ðŸ˜Ž This text will containt what made me come to where I am right now. This is merely an selfanalysis that I decided to transform in a Blog Post. So if you like long stories, you are welcome to read through it!
